## Description {#details}

Provide access to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option">Option</a> info table.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable">OptTable</a> class provides a layer of indirection which allows <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option">Option</a> instance to be created lazily. In the common case, only a few options will be needed at runtime; the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable">OptTable</a> class maintains enough information to parse command lines without instantiating Options, while letting other parts of the driver still use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option">Option</a> instances where convenient.

Definition at line 53 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/opttable-h">OptTable.h</a>.

  prototype={<>OptTable::OptTable (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtable">StringTable</a> &amp; StrTable, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringtable/offset">StringTable::Offset</a> &gt; PrefixesTable, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/opt/opttable/info">Info</a> &gt; OptionInfos, bool IgnoreCase=false)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Initialize <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable">OptTable</a> using Tablegen&#39;ed OptionInfos.

Child class must manually call <code>buildPrefixChars</code> once they are fully constructed.

### findNearest() {#a2bc0c8204694490e197301b24eb6c140}

Find the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable">OptTable</a> option that most closely matches the given string.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/option&quot;>Option</a>">- A string, such as &quot;-stdlibs=l&quot;, that represents user input of an option that may not exist in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable">OptTable</a>. Note that the string includes prefix dashes &quot;-&quot; as well as values &quot;=l&quot;.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[out] NearestString">- The nearest option string found in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/opttable">OptTable</a>.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[in] VisibilityMask">- Only include options with any of these visibility flags set.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[in] MinimumLength">- Don&#39;t find options shorter than this length. For example, a minimum length of 3 prevents &quot;-x&quot; from being considered near to &quot;-S&quot;.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="[in] MaximumDistance">- Don&#39;t find options whose distance is greater than this value.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
The edit distance of the nearest string found.
</SectionUser>

### ParseArgs() {#aae1e1c17454fb6433f039b5fb02c5c4d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>InputArgList OptTable::ParseArgs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; &gt; Args, unsigned &amp; MissingArgIndex, unsigned &amp; MissingArgCount, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/visibility">Visibility</a> VisibilityMask=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/visibility">Visibility</a>()) const</>}>
Parse an list of arguments into an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/inputarglist">InputArgList</a>.

The resulting <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/inputarglist">InputArgList</a> will reference the strings in &#91;<code>ArgBegin</code>, <code>ArgEnd</code>), and their lifetime should extend past that of the returned <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/inputarglist">InputArgList</a>.

The only error that can occur in this routine is if an argument is missing values; in this case <code>MissingArgCount</code> will be non-zero.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="MissingArgIndex">- On error, the index of the option which could not be parsed.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MissingArgCount">- On error, the number of missing options.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="VisibilityMask">- Only include options with any of these visibility flags set.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/inputarglist">InputArgList</a>; on error this will contain all the options which could be parsed.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/opttable-h/#l00371">371</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/opttable-h">OptTable.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/opttable-cpp/#l00500">500</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/opttable-cpp">OptTable.cpp</a>.

### suggestValueCompletions() {#aaddd5ed7dd146aad3e0c51691a90f22c}
